name: Hardlight
description:
A three week prototype of a Cyberpunk inspired point defense shooter.

Goal: Defend the center point. If hacked bots will try run away with stolen data. If they reach an exit portal the game is over. Survive long enough to win.

The objective was to learn how to - and what goes into making an FPS.

Note:
-The pistol is very broken as we didn't have time to implement animations. 
-Tutorial level is not currently functional in this build as the lighting is too dark.

Controls:
WASD - Movement
LMB - Fire
RMB - Aim down sight
Q - Propulsion (distance based)
E - Hand shield
LShift - Power slide
